com.empire_of_science.joao.coloreaters2

Class DrawGame

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.empire_of_science.joao.coloreaters2.DrawGame

  • class DrawGame
extends java.lang.Object
    Created by Jo√£o on 29/09/2016. This class is a singleton that contains the method for drawing the actual pieces, so that it is easier to change game graphics without changing activities and views.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private android.graphics.Paint backgroundPaint
      Paint used to draw the background of the board.
      private DrawGameBitmaps bitmaps
      Object containing the bitmaps.
      private int boardSide
      Used during calculations at onDraw.
      private static DrawGame drawGameHolder
      Static field to hold the singleton instance.
      private android.graphics.Paint linesPaint
      Paint used to draw the lines dividing the cells.
      private float scale
      If one multiplies the scale with an 0 to 1000 coordinate used by the pieces, one gets the 0 to boardSide equivalent, which is what is used to actually draw on the canvas.
      private android.graphics.Paint selectedPaint
      Paint used to draw the highlighted cell.
      (package private) int[] xCoordinates
      This arrays has the x coordinates of the sides of the board and cell lines.
      (package private) int[] yCoordinates
      This array has the y coordinates of the top and bottom of the board and cell lines.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor and Description
      private DrawGame(GameActivity activity)
      The constructor initializes all of the bitmaps from resources.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      private void determineBoardDimensions(android.graphics.Canvas canvas)
      Sets the fields that concern the board dimensions.
      private void drawBackground(android.graphics.Canvas canvas)
      Draws the background of the board.
      private void drawBlockPieces(Board board, android.graphics.Canvas canvas)
      Draws every blocking piece.
      private void drawBoardLines(android.graphics.Canvas canvas)
      Draws the board lines between the cells where pieces are.
      private void drawCake(Board board, android.graphics.Canvas canvas)
      Draws every cake piece.
      private void drawEaters(Board board, android.graphics.Canvas canvas)
      Draws every eater piece.
      (package private) void drawGame(android.graphics.Canvas canvas, Board board)
      Draws the different elements of the game, namely the background, the lines dividing the cells, and all the pieces.
      private void drawSelection(android.graphics.Canvas canvas, Board board)
      Draws the highlighting of the selected cell if there is one.
      private android.graphics.Bitmap getCakeBitmap(int color)
      Gets the bitmap of the cake with the corresponding color.
      private android.graphics.Bitmap getEaterBitmap(int color)
      Gets the bitmap of the eater with the corresponding color.
      (package private) static DrawGame getInstance(GameActivity activity)
      Returns an instance of DrawGame that has everything needed to draw every element of the game.

    • Field Detail

      • drawGameHolder

        private static DrawGame drawGameHolder
        Static field to hold the singleton instance.

      • xCoordinates

        int[] xCoordinates
        This arrays has the x coordinates of the sides of the board and cell lines.

      • yCoordinates

        int[] yCoordinates
        This array has the y coordinates of the top and bottom of the board and cell lines.

      • boardSide

        private int boardSide
        Used during calculations at onDraw. It represents the side of the game board square and the shortest side of the canvas of the GameView.

      • scale

        private float scale
        If one multiplies the scale with an 0 to 1000 coordinate used by the pieces, one gets the 0 to boardSide equivalent, which is what is used to actually draw on the canvas.

      • bitmaps

        private DrawGameBitmaps bitmaps
        Object containing the bitmaps.

      • backgroundPaint

        private android.graphics.Paint backgroundPaint
        Paint used to draw the background of the board.

      • linesPaint

        private android.graphics.Paint linesPaint
        Paint used to draw the lines dividing the cells.

      • selectedPaint

        private android.graphics.Paint selectedPaint
        Paint used to draw the highlighted cell.

    • Constructor Detail

      • DrawGame

        private DrawGame(GameActivity activity)
        The constructor initializes all of the bitmaps from resources.
        Parameters:
        activity - An reference to an activity is needed to get the resources.

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        static DrawGame getInstance(GameActivity activity)
        Returns an instance of DrawGame that has everything needed to draw every element of the game.
        Parameters:
        activity - The activity that calls for the DrawGame object, so it can draw on the activity.
        Returns:
        A DrawGame object.

      • determineBoardDimensions

        private void determineBoardDimensions(android.graphics.Canvas canvas)
        Sets the fields that concern the board dimensions.
        Parameters:
        canvas - The canvas which size is used to get the board dimensions.

        private void drawBackground(android.graphics.Canvas canvas)
        Draws the background of the board.
        Parameters:
        canvas - The canvas to draw to.

      • drawSelection

        private void drawSelection(android.graphics.Canvas canvas,
                           Board board)
        Draws the highlighting of the selected cell if there is one.
        Parameters:
        canvas - The canvas to draw to.
        board - The board containing the information about selected cell.

      • drawBoardLines

        private void drawBoardLines(android.graphics.Canvas canvas)
        Draws the board lines between the cells where pieces are.
        Parameters:
        canvas - The canvas to draw to.

                             android.graphics.Canvas canvas)
        Draws every blocking piece.

        canvas - The canvas to draw to.
